md:
giải nghĩa từ "draw" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

**Draw** (verb)

* Nghĩa tiếng việt: vẽ, kéo, rút, kéo dài
* Từ loại: động từ

**Draw** (verb) có các nghĩa sau:

* Vẽ: to create a picture or image using a pencil, pen, or other tool.
	+ Ví dụ: She drew a beautiful picture of the sunset.
* Kéo: to pull or move something towards oneself.
	+ Ví dụ: He drew the curtains open to let in the sunlight.
* Rút: to take out or remove something from a container or a place.
	+ Ví dụ: She drew out a book from the shelf.
* Kéo dài: to make something longer or to extend the duration of something.
	+ Ví dụ: The meeting was supposed to last an hour, but it drew out to two hours.

**Từ liên quan:**

* Drawing (noun): a picture or image created using a pencil, pen, or other tool.
	+ Ví dụ: The drawing on the wall was very impressive.
* Drawer (noun): a person who draws or creates pictures.
	+ Ví dụ: He is a talented drawer and painter.
* Drawing board (noun): a flat surface used for drawing or designing.
	+ Ví dụ: The architect worked on the drawing board to create a new design.

**Từ trái nghĩa:**

* Erase (verb): to remove or delete something, especially a mark or a drawing.
	+ Ví dụ: She erased the mistake on the paper.
* Push (verb): to move something away from oneself.
	+ Ví dụ: He pushed the door open to enter the room.

giải nghĩa từ "draw" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Draw (verb)

  • Nghĩa tiếng việt: vẽ, kéo, rút, kéo dài
  • Từ loại: động từ

Draw (verb) có các nghĩa sau:

  • Vẽ: to create a picture or image using a pencil, pen, or other tool.
    • Ví dụ: She drew a beautiful picture of the sunset.
  • Kéo: to pull or move something towards oneself.
    • Ví dụ: He drew the curtains open to let in the sunlight.
  • Rút: to take out or remove something from a container or a place.
    • Ví dụ: She drew out a book from the shelf.
  • Kéo dài: to make something longer or to extend the duration of something.
    • Ví dụ: The meeting was supposed to last an hour, but it drew out to two hours.

Từ liên quan:

  • Drawing (noun): a picture or image created using a pencil, pen, or other tool.
    • Ví dụ: The drawing on the wall was very impressive.
  • Drawer (noun): a person who draws or creates pictures.
    • Ví dụ: He is a talented drawer and painter.
  • Drawing board (noun): a flat surface used for drawing or designing.
    • Ví dụ: The architect worked on the drawing board to create a new design.

Từ trái nghĩa:

  • Erase (verb): to remove or delete something, especially a mark or a drawing.
    • Ví dụ: She erased the mistake on the paper.
  • Push (verb): to move something away from oneself.
    • Ví dụ: He pushed the door open to enter the room.
